channel.title: Update position[Read][And help]
channel.description:
How Do I Make It Update Every1s Postion Like Every Second Or Something...
Like If Im Standing Next To Some1 And I Teleport To A New position(abs or what eva U Wana Call It), The Other Player Still Sees Me Where I Was B4 I Teled. (like If Im At 3333, 3333 And I Tele To 3333,3334 The Other Person Still Sees Me At 3333, 3333)
If I Do The Same Thing On Dodain It All Works Fine, How Can I make It Work For My Server?
Is There Like SomeThing I Can Add In My Tele Command That Make It Update My Position For Every1?not just me
